---

# My Dream Home Moodboard
* Loft-hammock like tiny-home
* Function > Form, but like functional aesthetic
* Skylights! or fake skylights!

* Solar or river-power gen would be awesome
* Art-studio
  * Big fans for fumes
  * Large-format photo printer


* Tons of matte-back painted garage shelving

* Smarthome
  * Voice controlled lighting
  * Voice controlled TV
    * Chromecast
    * IR Blaster
* Tag-based/fingerprint key system (phone NFC entry?)

* Gas stove top! with 8 spots
* large oven
* big fridge
* spare fridge / coldroom?

* Home made wood-burning hottub
* Large deck area with adjustable shelter from wind and sun
